description.en: Udemy is an online learning and teaching marketplace with over 100000 courses and 24 million students.
description.tr: Udemy, internetten ders alabileceğiniz oldukça popüler global bir internet sitesidir.
description.nl: Udemy is een online leer- en onderwijsmarktplaats met meer dan 100.000 cursussen en 24 miljoen studenten.
